title: Joe Biden to appear on 60 Minutes this Sunday
text:
Presidential candidate Joe Biden on Tuesday spoke to CBS Evening News anchor and managing editor Norah O'Donnell for a 60 Minutes report on the state of his campaign. The interview took place at the former vice president's home in Delaware and includes a joint interview with his wife, Dr. Jill Biden. It will be broadcast on 60 Minutes, Sunday, October 27 at 7:30 p.m. ET and 7 p.m. PT on CBS.

O'Donnell's wide-ranging interview with Mr. Biden also covers President Donald Trump, the impeachment inquiry, foreign policy and Facebook.
description: The former vice president talks to Norah O'Donnell about the state of his presidential campaign Sunday, October 27 at 7:30 p.m. ET and 7 p.m. PT on CBS
